name: @small-tech/auto-encrypt
description: Automatically provisions and renews Let’s Encrypt™ TLS certificates for Node.js® https servers (including Express.js, etc.)

scripts.generate-dependency-diagram: node_modules/.bin/depcruise --exclude "^node_modules|lib/util|typedefs|^https|^crypto$|^fs$|^os$|^tls$|^path$|^events$|^http$|^util" --output-type dot index.js | dot -T svg > artefacts/dependency-graph.svg
scripts.generate-developer-documentation: npm run generate-dependency-diagram && node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md --private --template developer-documentation.hbs --files typedefs/**/*.js --files index.js --files lib/*.js > developer-documentation.md

author: Aral Balkan
